locations.dldescription: Location identifier usng a URN-based identification string containing namespace and unique identifier within the namespace.Used as an externally meaningful identifier. Eg. urn:nzl:pri:location:FOL_ID:CL-9587-0176

identifier.dldescription: Farm Identifier using a URN-based identification string containing namespace and unique identifier within the namespace. Used as an extremely meaningful identifier. Eg. urn:nzl:pri:farm:AgriBase:12345, urn:nzl:pri:farm:Farmax:67645

name.dldescription: Name of the Farm. Eg. Green Acres Farm

type.dldescription: Describes the type of enterprise the animals belong to. Enumeration : Own Stock, Finishing, Contract Grazing

use.dldescription: Describes the use of the enterprise the animals belong to. Values can be Stud, Commercial

totalArea.dldescription: Total farm area expressed in hectares

cultivableArea.dldescription: Effective area of the farm for cultivation (cropping) purposes

subtype.dldescription: DairyNZ farm system number, B+LNZ farm class

topography.dldescription: Rolling, Easy hill, Steep hill (this enumeration is defined by Overseer). Can be different for other systems

organization.dldescription: Organisation that owns or controls the farm

customerName.dldescription: Name of Dairy or Meat Processor

farmBlocks.dldescription: Array of blocks in the farm

farmEnterprise.dldescription: Array of enterprises on the farm

replacementRate.dldescription: % annual replacement rate in ewe flock or breeding cows
